Name: Easy puzzle: Animals
About the game: Easy puzzle: Animals - This is a logical game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture. In the pictures that need to be collected, different animals are depicted. During the assembly of the puzzle, a stopwatch is in progress so that the player can set his personal best. Every two levels, more pieces appear to assemble the puzzle. The game is accompanied by a pleasant soundtrack. Key features of the game: - 12 beautiful pictures with animals! - Pleasant sound! - Achievements!
